news.title: Defense chief inspects security posture aboard Air Force aircraft
news.description: Defense Minister Ahn Gyu-back conducted his first inspection of the year Thursday aboard an airborne early warning aircraft amid lingering security concerns over North Korea, the ministry said. Ahn flew on the E-737 Peace Eye, flanked by KF-21, FA-50 and TA-50 jets, marking the first time homegrown aircraft were used for such an escort mission, according to the defense ministry. news.title: Viruses on plastic waste pose new antibiotic resistance risks
news.description: Plastic pollution does more than litter landscapes and oceans. According to a new perspective article published in Biocontaminant, viruses living on plastic surfaces may play an underrecognized role in spreading antibiotic resistance, raising concerns for environmental and public health worldwide.
